Description: Rectangular limestone stela; fifteen lines of Greek text coloured red and containing an epitaph in verse dedicated by Kallis, probably the wife of the deceased. Dated to year five of an emperor, the 18th of the month of Epiph.
Bibliographic references: Inscription / The Collection of Ancient Greek Inscriptions in the British Museum (1077)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
Acquisition notes: Seen in a Luxor dealers shop by Sayce and P. Jourget.
